mapper.select: SELECT mbmm.id, mbmm.`serial_number`, mbmm.`marketing_business_capital_id`, mbmm.`trade_type`, mbmm.`bonus_money`, mbmm.`make_proportion`, mbmm.`amount`, mbmm.`total_balance`, mbmm.`pay_time`, mbmm.`trade_no`, mbmm.`accounts_way`, mbc.`capital_name` FROM (SELECT * FROM marketing_business_make_money ${ew.customSqlSegment})mbmm LEFT JOIN marketing_business_capital mbc ON mbmm.`marketing_business_capital_id` = mbc.`id` WHERE mbmm.`del_flag` = 0
